protocol.text: 5 ml of either water (mock) or 1 mM salicylic acid (SA) was poured onto 56 mm Petri dishes containing 4-day old seedlings. After 40 min of incubation at room temperature, the excess liquid was discarded.  Ten hours after treatment, samples were collected.

WT (a Columbia line containing a -800GSTF8::LUC reporter) and dsr1 (an EMS mutant of the Columbia line containing a -800GSTF8::LUC reporter) Arabidopsis seeds were stratified for 3 days at 4ºC.  They were germinated on MS-media and grown in a  21ºC growth room with a 16 hour light/ 8 hour dark cycle.  4 day old seedlings were used in this experiment.
Total RNA was extracted using the Qiagen Rneasy kit, following manufacturer's instructions
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 2 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

cRNA was hybridized to the GeneChip® Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array using a Genechip instrument system with scanner 3000 7G and autoloader for expression array processing and analysis, following manufacturer's protocol.  Labeling, hybing and scanning were performed at the Australian Genome Research Facility.
Genechips were scanned Affymetrix GeneChip scanner 3000 7G

The raw data files underwent background correction, normalization, probe specific correction, and summary value computation using the Robust Multichip Average (RMA) method in the Bioconductor package.  To find the differentially expressed genes we utilized the limma package for R to calculate the Log2 fold change, the moderate t-statistic, B value, and the adjusted p value (Benjamini–Hochberg FDR) for each array probe.
